Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People across Australia are taking to social media to express their views ahead of the upcoming federal budget. Many are calling for an increased jobseeker rate and additional welfare assistance while others are advocating for more support for young homeless people and affordable health coverage. There are also concerns about the cost of tax cuts and calls for funding towards important infrastructure projects. As the budget approaches people are urging decision-makers to prioritize the needs of the people and the country.
